posts.title: Hexo+GitHub 实现多端同步管理
posts.text: 前期准备Node.jsHexo基于Node.js，下载地址:Download|Node.js，也可以使用nvm来进行Node.js的版本管理 Git 创建名为yourname.github.io的仓库，注意是public 需要配置SSH免密登录，便于Hexo上传静态文件到github page Hexo 安装Hexo 1npm install -g hexo-cli 初始化Hexo 1hexo init 部署到github 安装hexo-deployer-git插件 1npm install hexo-deployer-git --save /_config.yml文件修改 1234deploy: type: git repository: git@github.com:yourname/yourname.github.io.git branch: master hexo deploy后可以访问https://yourname.github.io/来查看部署情况

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
